settings.title: Why Genemco
settings.content: Genemco has the world's largest inventory of used industrial ammonia refrigeration equipment and is a leader in used food processing equipment. Genemco has served customers globally for over 30 years.

settings.title: Are you an insider?
settings.subheading: Join the Genemco community of over 30,000 and receive exclusive discounts, new inventory announcements, opportunities and our weekly newsletter - plus a few surprises!

settings.text: Use this bar to show information about your cookie policy.

settings.title: Liquidation Sale!
settings.content:
We buy and sell more industrial ammonia refrigeration equipment than any other company in North America. Because of that we need to make room for new purchases in our warehouse! Let your Rep know that you want the Liquidation Price!

If you see something you like make an offer! We might just take you up on it!

settings.title: Genemco Spotlight
settings.content: Meet Cecil, our Sales Rep superstar! He makes the buying process fun and easy.

settings.title: Let's Get Social
settings.content: Stay up to date on new inventory & gain early access to unbeatable prices. We're a little entertaining too!

settings.title: We Ship Globally
settings.content: Genemco has shipped to 45+ countries. We partner with top shipping brokers & work make the process seamless.

settings.title: Genemco History Est. 1989
settings.content: Learn Genemco's history and why you can trust our 30+ years in business.

settings.title: Worlds Largest Inventory
settings.content: The largest inventory of preowned industrial refrigeration equipment.

settings.title: Amazing Customer Testimonials
settings.content: Genemco's customers are happy to share their buying experiences.

settings.title: Sell Your Equipment
settings.content: Quickly and easily convert your machinery into cash.

settings.heading: Trust our 30 years in business. 5,000+ satisfied customers since 1989.

settings.title: Become a Genemco Insider
settings.content: Join the Genemco community of over 30,000 and receive exclusive discounts, new inventory announcements, opportunities and our weekly newsletter - plus a few surprises!

Mark McMillian, the soon-to-be founder of Genemco, was running a small successful dairy business in Texas. While running this business he picked up a few tools along the way. To save money, he invested in using pre-owned equipment and became an expert at auctions. When it came time to sell his business to the largest dairy company in the region, the equipment he acquired over the years was still in his possession because it was not part of the deal. And with that, the entrepreneur in Mark harnessed his know-how, his auction expertise and his relationships he created along the way and channeled all of it into a new company. A pre-owned equipment company not just for dairy but for all industrial food processing and refrigeration equipment that would help others have access to the equipment they at any budget and with zero lead times. Thus, Genemco was born.
Genemco begins to build a robust inventory and became a leader in acquisition of pre-owned food equipment at North American auctions.
It didn't take long for Genemco to expand and begin shipping its products all over the world.
Genemco launched its groundbreaking online inventory of equipment for global sales.
Genemco became the largest supplier of used ammonia refrigeration equipment on the globe.
Genemco upgrades to a huge 700,000 sq. ft. warehouse that is a quarter of a mile long and a 30 acre equipment yard in Hearne, TX.
Genemco launches a brand new business-to-business e-commerce website platform offering customers a superior, secure and effortless experience in the buying process of equipment.

settings.gift_wrap_text: Do you want a gift wrap?

settings.title: Join Us
settings.content: Join the Genemco community of over 30,000 and receive exclusive discounts, new inventory announcements, opportunities and our weekly newsletter - plus a few surprises!

settings.heading: Leadership Team
settings.sub_heading: With over 100 years of combined refrigeration, food service, process, technology and business experience, we've got a well-seasoned team at the helm.

settings.member_desc:
What is your favorite part about your job?

The favorite part of my job is being on a journey to create a company I love alongside people that I love. Building a strong culture full of amazing employees and customers/partners that enjoy working together to conquer great challenges.

Favorite Superhero?

Superman has been an inspiration to me since I was little. But I also love me some Batman and Spiderman. Today God is my real-life superhero.

Favorite Sports Team?

Team Genemco

Favorite Food?

Anything I cook together with my wife in our kitchen

Fun Fact about you?

I’m a tech entrepreneur turned equipment reseller. I’m a Norwegian and US citizen

What do you like to do outside of work?

Being active in sports and with family/friends

What is your favorite part about your job?

Creating new ideas to help the company and its employees do their BEST!

Favorite Superhero?

Jesus

Favorite Sports Team?

Michigan State Spartans - GO GREEN!

Favorite Food?

Anything from True Food Kitchen!

Fun Fact about you?

Prior to Genemco, I was a hair stylist and makeup artist and have worked on several celebrity clients!

settings.heading: Sales & Marketing Team
settings.sub_heading: Our sales and marketing team is the best! They will help make sure you get all of your questions answered and get the best quality content.

settings.member_desc:
What is your favorite part about your job?

Every day is something new, and I get to flex my problem-solving skills

Favorite Superhero?

Jack Knight-Starman (We share the same last name)

Favorite Sports Team?

Astros and The Texans

Favorite Food?

Tacos

Fun Fact about you?

I have an absolutely colossal collection of comics and graphic novels

What do you like to do outside of work?

I love building models and spending time with my family

What is your favorite part about your job?

Work-life balance and ample opportunities to be creative while learning and growing with my team every day.

Favorite Superhero?

Wonder Woman

Favorite Sports Team?

Any team my kids are on

Favorite Food?

Italian food + Brisket Street Tacos

Fun Fact about you?

I once placed 3rd in a gift wrapping competition from the Ellen DeGeneres Show and Scotch Tape and won 300 bucks!

What do you like to do outside of work?

I enjoy spending time with my family, art, and traveling.

What is your favorite part about your job?

Helping customers solve their challenges or problems, being able to communicate with my International friends in the industry, and making new ones

Favorite Superhero?

Ironman

Favorite Sports Team?

Because I have lived in 4 different states it is hard to pick a team. I like Tampa Bay Buccaneers

Favorite Food?

Mexican and Indian food

Fun Fact about you?

I like adrenaline rides such as rollercoasters, Ziplining, 3D virtual rides, etc. Skydiving is on my bucket list.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I enjoy spending time with my family, playing tennis with friends, playing with my pets, and listening to smooth jazz.

What is your favorite part about your job?

Building relationships with our clients and understanding their needs. It challenges me and makes me learn strategies to overcome. It’s like putting an engine together, and the satisfaction of listening to that engine roar for the first time is unmatched.

Favorite Superhero?

Jesus. He lived our lives, yet he did it without sin.

Favorite Sports Team?

Red Bull, in Formula 1. It’s a team effort, not a single person’s effort.

Favorite Food?

Seafood, pizza… Seafood… burgers! I'm not very picky and I love to try new dishes.

Fun Fact about you?

I am a petrolhead! Bring a car into the conversation, we’ll probably end up talking for hours about them.

What do you like to do outside of work?

Work on cars, take long drives, explore, and travel.

What is your favorite part about your job?

Getting to know our customers, and what kind of businesses they operate.

Favorite Superhero?

Saitama-One Punch Man

Favorite Sports Team?

Texas Rangers Baseball Team

Favorite Food?

Ceviche

Fun Fact about you?

I used to breakdance, and I am a trained chef.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I love to travel, cook, and spend time with my family.

settings.heading: Operations Team
settings.sub_heading: Our operations team is the core of the business. They make sure our equipment, inventory, warehouse, office and finances are top of their game.

settings.member_desc:
What is your favorite part about your job?

The diversity

Favorite Superhero?

Bible: David, Isaiah, Esther, Paul

Favorite Sports Team?

Team Normangee...my grandson's school sports

Favorite Food?

Mexican

Fun Fact about you?

I lived in Te Aro Wellington, New Zealand for a year enjoying the sites, food, and culture.

What do you like to do outside of work?

I enjoy reading

What is your favorite part about your job?

The opportunity to learn many new things

Favorite Superhero?

Jesus Christ

Favorite Sports Team?

Houston Astros

Favorite Food?

That's hard to answer, but.....Cajun Food

Fun Fact about you?

I like restoring old trucks and cars

What do you like to do outside of work?

I like to travel and explore new places, as well as going to the race track, truck shows, and going to the Houston Astros games!

What is your favorite part about your job?

I love everything about it, especially the new things I learn

Favorite Superhero?

Captain America

Favorite Sports Team?

Golden State Warriors

Favorite Food?

Pizza

Fun Fact about you?

I love dogs

What do you like to do outside of work?

Playing volleyball

What is your favorite part about your job?

All of it - something different all the time

Favorite Superhero?

Jean Claude Van Damme

Favorite Sports Team?

Mexico Football Team

Favorite Food?

Shrimp

Fun Fact about you?

I like to joke around

What do you like to do outside of work?

Play with my son

What is your favorite part about your job?

All of it - something different all the time

Favorite Superhero?

God

Favorite Sports Team?

Mexico Football Team

Favorite Food?

Grilled Meat

Fun Fact about you?

I like to walk in the park

What do you like to do outside of work?

Rest and be grateful
